=== Test Plan ===

==== To Ensure No Regression ====

* Install upstart version 1.13.2~rtm-0ubuntu1 available from:
   https://launchpad.net/~ci-train-ppa-service/+archive/ubuntu-rtm/landing-007/+packages
* Perform following checks:
** Ensure phone is still responsive
** Check to ensure no `/var/crash/_usr_sbin_init*.crash` crash files are generated as a result of the package upgrade.
** Ensure file `/var/log/upstart/upstart.state` does not exist.
* Reboot phone
* Repeat above checks.
